MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to complete a repair on an underground cable on Heath Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.13am on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
